item.title: 交易所运营商 MIAX 首次公开募股 3.45 亿美元后大涨 36
item.description: 迈阿密国际控股公司（Miami International Holdings Inc.【原文：Miami International Holdings Inc. rose 36% from its initial public offering price as the exchange operator became the most recent financial services business to get a warm welcome in its trading debut.】

item.title: 加航警告因劳资纠纷取消航班将引发混乱
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）表示，在可能出现的劳工中断之前，该公司将结束运营，并将继续与空乘人员进行谈判。【原文：Air Canada said it remains available to continue negotiations with its flight attendants as it winds down operations ahead of a potential labor disruption.】

item.title: 纳米比亚认为采用南非计划的较低消费物价指数目标有好处
item.description: 纳米比亚央行行长表示，纳米比亚央行认为采用南非储备银行提出的较低通胀目标有好处。【原文：Namibia’s central bank sees benefits to adopting a lower inflation target proposed by the South African Reserve Bank, its governor said.】

item.title: 壳牌支持的 Raízen 寻求新资金，股价创历史新低
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）支持的巴西糖业和乙醇巨头正在寻求新的资金，因为错误的押注导致其债务激增。周四，该公司股价跌至历史最低点。【原文：A Brazilian sugar and ethanol powerhouse backed by Shell Plc is seeking fresh capital after bad bets led to a surge in debt. The shares tumbled to an all-time low on Thursday.】

item.title: 油价疲软拖累贸易，俄罗斯出口连续第五个月下滑
item.description: 由于全球商品价格疲软继续拖累贸易，俄罗斯 6 月份出口连续第五个月萎缩。【原文：Russia’s exports contracted for a fifth month in June as weaker global commodity prices continued to weigh on trade.】

item.title: 生产成本超过消费价格，S&P 500 利润面临风险
item.description: 美国企业提高利润率和维持美股涨势的努力面临着一个关键障碍：消费者价格和生产者价格之间的差距不断扩大，关税的不确定性又加剧了这一问题。【原文：Corporate America’s effort to boost margins and sustain US stock gains faces a key hurdle: a widening gap between consumer and producer prices, compounded by tariff uncertainties.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Cohere 获得新一轮融资，估值达 68 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Cohere Inc.在新一轮融资中筹集了5亿美元，这是该公司在向企业和政府销售人工智能服务方面与大型科技公司竞争的一部分。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Cohere Inc. has raised $500 million in a new round of funding, part of a bid to compete with larger tech firms in selling AI services to businesses and governments.】

item.title: Meta 的超级智能梦之队将成为本世纪的管理挑战
item.description:
数十年的研究表明 为团队配备过多天才可能会适得其反。【原文：

Decades of research suggest that packing a team with too much genius can backfire.

】

item.title: BBVA 就西班牙禁止交易后整合萨瓦德尔银行提出上诉
item.description: 西班牙政府决定阻止西班牙对外银行（Banco Sabadell SA）的收购要约成功后对其进行整合，BBVA SA 对此提出上诉。【原文：BBVA SA has appealed the decision by the Spanish government to block it from integrating Banco Sabadell SA if its takeover offer is successful.】

item.title: 私募信贷基金发现可用于调配资金的交易越来越少
item.description: 长期以来，私人信贷高管们一直认为交易回暖指日可待。由于美国关税和长期的交易荒阻碍了该行业关键部分的资金投入，扭转局势的希望在第二季度破灭了。【原文：Private credit executives have long said a deal comeback is right around the corner. That hope for a turnaround was quashed in the second quarter as US tariffs and a prolonged deal drought stymied how much capital a key part of the industry put to work.】

item.title: 阿根廷当局缓解债务拍卖影响，阿根廷比索上涨
item.description: 阿根廷比索周四走高，因为在一次关键的地方债务拍卖会上，哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政府仅推出了61%的到期债务，低于市场预期，阿根廷当局希望以此安抚投资者。【原文：Argentina’s peso edged higher on Thursday, as authorities looked to reassure investors after a key local debt auction fell short of market expectations, with President Javier Milei’s administration rolling over just 61% of maturities.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆称现在决定 9 月利率为时尚早
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，他现在决定是否在下个月的会议上降低利率还为时过早。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said it’s too early for him to decide on whether to lower interest rates at next month’s meeting.】

item.title: 罗杰斯将向阳光人寿旗下资产管理公司出售九个数据中心
item.description: 罗杰斯通信公司将向基础设施资产管理公司 InfraRed Capital Partners 出售由九个数据中心组成的投资组合，以帮助偿还债务。【原文：Rogers Communications Inc. will sell a portfolio of nine data centers to infrastructure asset manager InfraRed Capital Partners to help pay down debt.】

item.title: 里夫斯希望堵住财政黑洞，为何英国增税迫在眉睫？
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）即将迎来一个艰难的秋季预算，经济学家们做出了一个共同的预测：增税在即。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves is heading into a difficult autumn budget as economists make a common prediction: tax rises are in store.】

item.title: 垃圾级债务热潮面临投资者疲劳，部分交易停滞不前
item.description: 几个月来一直是借款人市场，但有迹象表明，投资者对高风险债务的热情开始减退。【原文：It’s been a borrowers’ market for months, but signs of flagging investor zeal for the riskiest slices of debt are starting to trickle in.】

item.title: Peloton 准备更新自行车、人工智能和配件以促进销售
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司正计划进行多年来最大规模的产品升级，希望通过更新硬件、新配件和人工智能来重振销售业绩。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. is planning its biggest product upgrades in years, a bid to rejuvenate sales with refreshed hardware, new accessories and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 纤维公司 Zayo 获得债权人支持将债务延长至 2030 年
item.description: Zayo Group Holdings Inc. 与债权人达成协议，将这家光纤网络公司的债务期限延长至 2030 年。【原文：Zayo Group Holdings Inc. and creditors have agreed on a deal that would extend the fiber network company’s debt maturities to 2030.】

item.title: 随着关税风险上升，挪威海德鲁公司将裁减 750 个白领职位
item.description: 在全球不确定性和风险不断增加的情况下，挪威海德鲁公司（Norsk Hydro ASA）将裁减 750 个白领职位，以努力降低成本。【原文：Norsk Hydro ASA will cut 750 white-collar jobs in an effort to cut costs amid increasing global uncertainty and risks.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌，因PPI超预期上涨导致创纪录的上涨势头戛然而止
item.description: 美国股市周四下跌，原因是批发通胀率创下三年来最大增幅，阻止了帮助美国股市创下历史新高的风险反弹。【原文：US stocks fell on Thursday as wholesale inflation accelerated by the most in three years, halting a risk-on rally that helped set fresh record highs.】

item.title: 部长考虑各种税收计划，波兰银行业绩下滑
item.description: 在波兰财政部表示正在考虑对银行业征收新税的 "各种方案 "之后，波兰银行业的增长正面临近四个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Revved-up Polish banks are heading for their biggest decline in almost four months after the Finance Ministry said it’s considering “various scenarios” for new levies on the industry.】

item.title: 加拿大最大养老金收益率为 1%，美元疲软打击收益
item.description: 由于美元疲软在很大程度上抵消了股票和能源资产的收益，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）上季度的回报率为 1%。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board returned 1% last quarter as the weak US dollar largely offset gains in stocks and energy assets.】

item.title: OpenText 最大的投资者支持董事会解雇首席执行官的决定
item.description: 新斯科舍银行子公司 Jarislowsky Fraser Ltd.表示，支持软件公司 Open Text Corp. 董事会罢免长期首席执行官 Mark Barrenechea 的决定。【原文：Jarislowsky Fraser Ltd., a Bank of Nova Scotia subsidiary, says it supports software company Open Text Corp.’s board of directors in its decision to oust long-time Chief Executive Officer Mark Barrenechea.】

item.title: 印度称尽管特朗普征收 50%关税，但与美国的防务关系保持不变
item.description: 印度与华盛顿的防务关系仍在按部就班地进行，美国代表团将于本月访问新德里，尽管这个南亚国家正在努力应对唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的50%关税。【原文：India’s defense ties with Washington remain on track with a US delegation set to visit New Delhi this month, even as the South Asian nation grapples with President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs.】

item.title: 苹果手表血氧追踪器在胜诉后重返美国市场
item.description: 经过长达数年的法律诉讼，苹果公司智能手表的血氧追踪功能将重返美国市场。【原文：Apple Inc.’s blood oxygen tracking feature for its smartwatch is returning to the US after a yearslong legal fight.】

item.title: 油砂生产商通过减少维护提高产量
item.description: 加拿大油砂公司已经找到了在油价低迷的情况下提高产量的方法：减少设备的长时间维修。【原文：Canadian oil sands companies have found a way to ramp up production in the face of oil prices: curtailing lengthy repairs to equipment.】

item.title: Airbnb 让美国客人推迟到入住前付款
item.description: Airbnb Inc.正在让美国的客人预订一些旅行而无需预付费用，以争取那些不愿意提前预订的有预算意识的旅行者。【原文：Airbnb Inc. is letting guests in the US reserve some trips without paying upfront, an effort to win over budget-conscious travelers who may be reluctant to book in advance.】

item.title: BGN 为日内瓦和迪拜办事处招揽更多交易人才
item.description: 能源和大宗商品交易商 BGN 在去年招聘人才的基础上，又从贡渥集团（Gunvor Group Ltd.）和利塔斯科公司（Litasco SA）招聘了经验丰富的员工，以加强其团队。【原文：Energy and commodities trader BGN is strengthening its team with experienced hires from Gunvor Group Ltd. and Litasco SA, building on last year’s recruitment of talent.】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料油出口在无人机空袭中创下战时新高
item.description: 尽管乌克兰加强了对俄罗斯炼油厂的无人机袭击，但俄罗斯的石油产品出口在 8 月初仍有所增加，其中燃料油出口量激增，达到战争开始以来的最高水平。【原文：Russia’s petroleum product exports increased in early August despite intensified Ukrainian drone strikes on the country’s refineries, led by a surge in fuel oil shipments to the highest level since the start of the war.】

item.title: 马斯克的星链公司接近与沙特阿拉伯国旗航空公司达成协议
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的国旗航空公司正在与 SpaceX 公司就安装 Starlink 互联网服务进行深入讨论，此举将扩大埃隆-马斯克在竞争激烈的机载 Wifi 市场上的业务范围。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s flag carrier airline is in advanced discussions with SpaceX to install the Starlink internet service, in a move that would expand Elon Musk’s footprint in a highly competitive market for onboard wifi, according to people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，交易员在 PPI 之后减少对美联储降息的押注
item.description: 在生产层面的通胀数据强于预期，促使交易商减少对美联储下月降息的押注之后，国债走低。【原文：Treasuries moved lower after a reading of inflation at the production level came in stronger than expected, prompting traders to pare bets the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】
